product_name: DAKINE Mode Bike Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's DAKINE Mode Bike Shorts are tough enough to ride the sickest downhills and comfortable enough to take into town afterward. Durable nylon fabric stands up to life on the singletrack; stretch-woven back yoke adjusts for a comfortable fit. Polyester mesh liners wick moisture and dry quickly. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Hand pockets and rear pockets, plus 2 zippered leg pockets. Waist adjustment tabs for a personalized fit; zip fly with 2-button closure. Zippered inner thigh vents on the women's DAKINE Mode Bike Shorts let you quickly dump excess heat. Closeout.
short_description: The women's DAKINE Mode Bike Shorts are tough enough to ride the sickest downhills and comfortable enough to take into town afterward.
